pages.text: Scrolls of Knowledge contain magical secrets that many wizards seek in order to learn to channel more mana.$(br2)Often times, experienced wizards can be found pawning off their old scrolls to newer, less experienced wizards, albeit for a hefty price.

Wizard Levels:$(li)Level 0 - 10 Mana$(li)Level 1 - 10 Mana$(li)Level 2 - 20 Mana$(li)Level 3 - 30 Mana$(li)Level 4 - 40 Mana$(li)Level 5 - 50 Mana$(li)Level 6 - 60 Mana$(li)Level 7 - 70 Mana$(li)Level 8 - 80 Mana$(li)Level 9 - 90 Mana$(li)Level 10 - 100 Mana
